title: No Fee!! Lavish, 1Bd apartment in Haverhill, Lndry, Cat Ok, Avail 10-1
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 32252921', 'Rent: $1,475 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 10/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Only', 'Rent Includes:: Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', '-No Brokers Fee!', "Landlord paying respective rental agent full broker's fee!!", '-Spacious 1 bedroom apartment located on Washington Street in Haverhill.', '-Carpeted', 'Flooring in living room and bedroom.', '-Tiled Kitchen comes with oven/stove, microwave, dishwasher, full refrigerator and plenty of cabinet space.', '-Coin-Op laundry located on first floor of building.', '-Cat', 'Ok', '-Student', 'Ok', '-No utilities included in rent', '-Street parking', '-Apartment comes available on 10-1!', 'Connor J. Hanrahan', 'Prestige Rental Solutions', 'FOR MORE EXCLUSIVE LISTINGS VISIT: <URL>', 'Anti discrimination Policy-', 'All apartments advertised by Prestige Rental Solutions are available on an equal opportunity basis.', 'All real estate advertised herein is subject to the federal Fair Housing Act and the Massachusetts state law, M.G.L. c.151B, which makes it illegal to advertise any preference, limitation, or discrimination , or discriminate against any person because of race, color, religion, sex, disability ,family status, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, genetic information , ancestry, martial status, national origin or because the person is a member of the  armed forces.']
